name: Classic Açaí Bowl
ingredients: Pure açaí base, granola, banana slices, honey, strawberry and blueberries.

name: Tropical Delight
ingredients: Base of açaí, granola, mango, coconut flakes, kiwi and strawberry.

name: Berry Blast
ingredients: Açaí base, mixed berries (strawberry, blueberry, raspberry), chia seeds, agave.

name: Nutty Dream
ingredients: Açaí base, peanut butter, chopped almonds, cashews, chocolate chips.

name: Green Power Açaí
ingredients: Base of açaí, kiwi, green grape, green apple and coconut water.

name: Sergipano Special
ingredients: Acai base, local fruit (cashew), strawberry, granola, pineapple, papaya, condensed milk.

name: Red Fusion Bowl
ingredients: Açaí base, red dragon fruit (pitaya), strawberries, raspberries, pomegranate seeds, and a touch of honey.

name: Pineapple Fresh Bowl
ingredients: Açaí base blended with pineapple, topped with fresh pineapple chunks, coconut flakes, mint leaves, and granola.

name: Surprise Açaí Shake
ingredients: A creamy blend of açaí, banana, a secret mix of tropical juices, and a hint of vanilla.

name: Nutty Fruit Fusion
ingredients: Açaí base, granola, banana, strawberries, topped with a mix of walnuts, pecans, and a drizzle of almond butter.

name: Premium Açaí Experience
ingredients: Pure, high-grade açaí, topped with organic granola, goji berries, bee pollen, sliced almonds, and a drizzle of organic agave nectar.

name: Fresh Sandwich
ingredients: Light and healthy sandwich with whole grain bread, turkey, lettuce, bacon, tomato, and avocado.
